MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:33pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because we are arranging for a generator to be connected due to faulty electrical equipment and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:36 PM on Friday, 19 March 2021.
